sql.query:
SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_GET.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */

SELECT id
FROM r_cart
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetUser.user_id}} */

SELECT SUM(rc.total_price::float) as total_amt
FROM r_cart rc
WHERE rc.user_id = @user

SELECT rsa.blank1, rsa.blank2, (select msc1.base_charge from public.m_shipping_charge msc1 where msc1.market_id=@market and msc1.status=1), (select msc2.add_charge_per_km from public.m_shipping_charge msc2 where msc2.market_id=@market and msc2.status=1),
SQRT(POW(69.1 * (rsa.blank1::float - (select msc.office_lat::float from public.m_shipping_charge msc where msc.market_id=@market and msc.status=1)), 2) + POW(69.1 * ((select msc.office_long::float from public.m_shipping_charge msc where msc.market_id=@market and msc.status=1) - rsa.blank2::float) * COS(rsa.blank1::float / 57.3), 2)) AS distance
FROM r_shipping_add rsa 
where rsa.c_id =@user and rsa.status = @active_address order by rsa.id desc limit 1;

SELECT rc.id, rc.prod_id, rc.price_id, rc.user_id, rc.prod_unit_price, rc.cart_mrp, rc.prod_qty, rc.total_price, mp.prod_name_en as prod_name, mp.prod_desc_en as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mp.prod_mark_id, mr.shop_name_en as shop_name, mp.rest_id, (select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_ids, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price
FROM r_cart rc
LEFT JOIN m_product AS mp ON (mp.id = rc.prod_id) 
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = mp.rest_id)
WHERE rc.user_id = @user ORDER BY rc.id DESC

SELECT rc.id, rc.prod_id, rc.price_id, rc.user_id, rc.prod_unit_price, rc.cart_mrp, rc.prod_qty, rc.total_price, mp.prod_name_bn as prod_name, mp.prod_desc_bn as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mp.prod_mark_id, mr.shop_name_bn as shop_name, mp.rest_id, (select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_ids, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price
FROM r_cart rc
LEFT JOIN m_product AS mp ON (mp.id = rc.prod_id) 
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = mp.rest_id)
WHERE rc.user_id = @user ORDER BY rc.id DESC

SELECT rc.id, rc.prod_id, rc.price_id, rc.user_id, rc.prod_unit_price, rc.cart_mrp, rc.prod_qty, rc.total_price, mp.prod_name_hin as prod_name, mp.prod_desc_hin as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mp.prod_mark_id, mr.shop_name_hin as shop_name, mp.rest_id, (select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_ids, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price
FROM r_cart rc
LEFT JOIN m_product AS mp ON (mp.id = rc.prod_id) 
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = mp.rest_id)
WHERE rc.user_id = @user ORDER BY rc.id DESC

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountNewCust
FROM r_order
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT id, promo_name, promo_code, amt_or_percent, promo_amt, promo_per, cashback_amt_or_per, cashback_amt, cashback_per
FROM promo_code
WHERE auto_apply = :P1 /* {{'Yes'}} */ AND status = :P2 /* {{1}} */ AND start_date < :P3 /* {{NOW}} */ AND end_date >= :P4 /* {{NOW}} */ AND (allotted_for = :P5 /* {{'All'}} */ OR user_id = :P6 /* {{GetUser.user_id}} */)
